projects.title: Aurum Cartel Web Application
projects.description: Developed the frontend of Aurum Cartel, an online trading education platform designed to help users learn and practice trading strategies effectively.

projects.title: Madatlas Review Platform
projects.description: Implemented and integrated the UI for the Madatlas review application.

projects.title: EMIT Official Website
projects.description: Developed the user interface for the official website of the Ecole de Management et d'Innovation Technologique (EMIT), focusing on responsive design and seamless user experience.

projects.title: EMILIB Web Application
projects.description: Designed and implemented the UI/UX for the EMILIB application and developed its authentication module. Implement Authentication Service with JWT.

projects.title: Microservices Architecture – Acceleration Week by PNUD
projects.description: Contributed to improving civic engagement through microservice architecture design during the PNUD Acceleration Week.

projects.title: Ambalavao Website
projects.description: Implemented the official website of Ambalavao with a modern and responsive design.

projects.title: Marolook Website Redesign
projects.description: Redesigned and implemented the Marolook website with an improved interface and user experience.

projects.title: Citizen Participation – Hackathon PNUD
projects.description: Developed a user interface for a civic engagement platform; won 1st place at the PNUD Hackathon.

projects.title: Tisradar Digital Library
projects.description: Developed the administration interface (frontend & backend) and deployed the digital library platform 'TISRADAR'.
